mapper.select: SELECT p.PJ_ID , p.TITLE ,p.description , p.PRICE , p.IMG , STARTDATE, p.ENDDATE, (TRUNC(p.ENDDATE - SYSDATE)) AS DDAY, p.GOAL_AMT, (SELECT COUNT(f.F_ID) FROM FUNDING f WHERE f.PJ_ID = p.PJ_ID ) AS NOW_AMT, p.U_ID ,gu.NICKNAME, (SELECT (COUNT(f.F_ID) / p.GOAL_AMT) * 100 FROM FUNDING f WHERE f.PJ_ID = p.PJ_ID) AS ACHV_PERCENT FROM PROJECT p JOIN GRD_USER gu ON P.U_ID = gu.U_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FUNDING f ON p.PJ_ID = f.PJ_ID and p.STARTDATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY p.ENDDATE

SELECT p.PJ_ID , p.TITLE , p.description , p.PRICE , p.IMG , p.INFO_IMG , c.G_NAME, STARTDATE, p.ENDDATE, (TRUNC(p.ENDDATE - SYSDATE)) AS dday, p.GOAL_AMT, (SELECT COUNT(f.F_ID) FROM FUNDING f WHERE f.PJ_ID = p.PJ_ID ) AS NOW_AMT, p.U_ID ,gu.NICKNAME, (SELECT (COUNT(f.F_ID) / p.GOAL_AMT) * 100 FROM FUNDING f WHERE f.PJ_ID = p.PJ_ID) AS achv_percent FROM PROJECT p JOIN GRD_USER gu ON P.U_ID = gu.U_ID JOIN AUTHOR_DETAIL ad ON p.U_ID = ad.U_ID JOIN CATEGORY c ON p.G_ID = c.G_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN FUNDING f ON p.PJ_ID = f.PJ_ID where p.PJ_ID = #{pj_id}

SELECT p.PJ_ID , p.TITLE ,p.description , STARTDATE, p.ENDDATE, p.GOAL_AMT, (SELECT COUNT(f.F_ID) FROM FUNDING f WHERE f.PJ_ID = p.PJ_ID ) AS NOW_AMT, p.U_ID ,gu.NICKNAME, (SELECT (COUNT(f.F_ID) / p.GOAL_AMT) * 100 FROM FUNDING f WHERE f.PJ_ID = p.PJ_ID) AS ACHV_PERCENT FROM PROJECT p JOIN GRD_USER gu ON P.U_ID = gu.U_ID and p.u_id='zemma335' LEFT OUTER JOIN FUNDING f ON p.PJ_ID = f.PJ_ID ORDER BY p.ENDDATE
SELECT ad.*,ba.bank,ba.ACCOUNT_NUM FROM AUTHOR_DETAIL ad ,BANK_ACCOUNT ba WHERE ad.u_id='zemma335'
